summary: Small documet - yet in BETA - that aims to detail the classes in Skyrim. In the future it will be a mod with some gameplay changes. Document comes first - this will be implemented in-game-mod.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]Description
[/size][/font][/center][size=3]In this document you will find 2 classes from Skyrim - the way how I see it. It may help you when you start a game. But this is not what I wanted. This will be the begining of a mod that aims more class-type plays. The document will be implement in-game.

[/size]I'm not native speaker, so feel free to post whenever you find a mistype or any mistakes.Â
author: Karlinna
